SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0\n\npragma solidity 0.8.19;\n\n/* solhint-disable contract-name-camelcase */\n\nimport {IUniswapV3Pool} from \"@uniswap/v3-core/contracts/interfaces/IUniswapV3Pool.sol\";\n\nimport {IERC20} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol\";\n\nimport {IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2} from \"../vendor/dopexV2/IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2.sol\";\nimport {IDopexV2PositionManager} from \"../vendor/dopexV2/IDopexV2PositionManager.sol\";\n\nimport {ChainlinkQuoter} from \"./../ChainlinkQuoter.sol\";\n\n/**\n * @title IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorState\n * @dev Interface for the Orange Stryke LP Automator state.\n * @author Orange Finance\n */\ninterface IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorState {\n    /**\n     * @dev Struct representing tick information for rebalancing.\n     * @param tick The tick value.\n     * @param liquidity The liquidity at the tick.\n     */\n    struct RebalanceTickInfo {\n        int24 tick;\n        uint128 liquidity;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the position manager contract.\n     */\n    function manager() external view returns (IDopexV2PositionManager);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the liquidity handler contract.\n     */\n    function handler() external view returns (IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the handler hook contract.\n     */\n    function handlerHook() external view returns (address);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the Uniswap V3 pool contract.\n     */\n    function pool() external view returns (IUniswapV3Pool);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the Chainlink quoter contract.\n     */\n    function quoter() external view returns (ChainlinkQuoter);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the address of the asset USD feed.\n     */\n    function assetUsdFeed() external view returns (address);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the address of the counter asset USD feed.\n     */\n    function counterAssetUsdFeed() external view returns (address);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the deposit asset token contract.\n     */\n    function asset() external view returns (IERC20);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the counter asset token contract.\n     */\n    function counterAsset() external view returns (IERC20);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the tick spacing of the pool.\n     */\n    function poolTickSpacing() external view returns (int24);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Retrieves the active ticks as an array of int24 values.\n     * @return An array of int24 values representing the active ticks.\n     */\n    function getActiveTicks() external view returns (int24[] memory);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Calculates the total assets in the automator contract.\n     * It includes the assets in the Dopex pools and the automator contract itself.\n     * @return The total assets in the automator contract.\n     */\n    function totalAssets() external view returns (uint256);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Converts the given amount of assets to shares based on the total supply and total assets.\n     * @param assets The amount of assets to convert to shares.\n     * @return The converted amount of shares.\n     */\n    function convertToShares(uint256 assets) external view returns (uint256);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Converts the given amount of shares to assets based on the total supply and total assets.\n     * @param shares The amount of shares to convert to assets.\n     * @return The converted amount of assets.\n     */\n    function convertToAssets(uint256 shares) external view returns (uint256);\n}\n","keccak256":"0x4758f2f3480ec6f6fda0aa9abf71879293e5f4b546f6b52c536c25bb42b4b8ab","license":"GPL-3.0"},"contracts/dopex-v2-lp-automator/contracts/lib/UniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityLibV2.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0\n\npragma solidity 0.8.19;\n\nimport {IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2} from \"../vendor/dopexV2/IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2.sol\";\nimport {FullMath} from \"@uniswap/v3-core/contracts/libraries/FullMath.sol\";\n\n/**\n * @title UniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityLib\n * @dev Library for managing liquidity in a single Uniswap V3 tick.\n * @author Orange Finance\n */\nlibrary UniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityLibV2 {\n    /**\n     * @dev Calculates the unique token ID for a given set of parameters.\n     * @param handler The instance of the IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2 contract.\n     * @param pool The address of the Uniswap V3 pool.\n     * @param tickLower The lower tick of the range.\n     * @param tickUpper The upper tick of the range.\n     * @return The unique token ID.\n     */\n    function tokenId(\n        IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2 handler,\n        address pool,\n        address hook,\n        int24 tickLower,\n        int24 tickUpper\n    ) internal pure returns (uint256) {\n        return uint256(keccak256(abi.encode(handler, pool, hook, tickLower, tickUpper)));\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Get the position detail of a given owner and token ID.\n     * @dev option fee is already added in the liquidity via UniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2.donateToLiquidity function\n     * @param handler The instance of the UniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2 contract.\n     * @param owner The address of the position owner.\n     * @param tokenId_ The ID of the token.\n     * @return all The total amount of liquidity the owner has.\n     * @return redeemable The amount of liquidity that can be redeemed.\n     * @return locked The amount of liquidity that is locked.\n     * @return swapFee0 The amount of UniswapV3 Pool swap fee in token0.\n     * @return swapFee1 The amount of UniswapV3 Pool swap fee in token1.\n     * @notice swap fee (TokenIdInfo.tokenOwed0/1) is updated when the position is modified (mint/burn/use/unusePosition is called)\n     * Automator modifies position when rebalance/redeem is called. Therefore, swap fee might be outdated in between these operations.\n     */\n    function positionDetail(\n        IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2 handler,\n        address owner,\n        uint256 tokenId_\n    ) internal view returns (uint128 all, uint128 redeemable, uint128 locked, uint256 swapFee0, uint256 swapFee1) {\n        uint256 _shares = handler.balanceOf(owner, tokenId_);\n        if (_shares == 0) return (0, 0, 0, 0, 0);\n\n        IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2.TokenIdInfo memory _tki = handler.tokenIds(tokenId_);\n\n        all = handler.convertToAssets(uint128(_shares), tokenId_);\n\n        // Starting from handler v2, totalLiquidity might be less than liquidityUsed because reservedLiquidity has been introduced.\n        // Therefore, if totalLiquidity is less than liquidityUsed, we should return 0 to avoid underflow.\n        uint128 freePool = _tki.totalLiquidity < _tki.liquidityUsed ? 0 : _tki.totalLiquidity - _tki.liquidityUsed;\n        // If the vault is an only liquidity provider in the pool, 1 liquidity is locked in the pool.\n        // because when first stryke mint, the liquidity calculation result is less by 1 than from second mint.\n        // first mint does not use \"convertToAssets\" function, and not round up the result.\n        if (all > _tki.totalLiquidity && freePool > 0) freePool -= 1;\n        locked = all > freePool ? all - freePool : 0;\n\n        redeemable = all - locked;\n\n        swapFee0 = FullMath.mulDiv(_tki.tokensOwed0, redeemable, _tki.totalLiquidity);\n        swapFee1 = FullMath.mulDiv(_tki.tokensOwed1, redeemable, _tki.totalLiquidity);\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0xc0989e611b41a80aea0785c3cca9d3a166eda0884959ecba85a3ea17bc187ba9","license":"GPL-3.0"},"contracts/dopex-v2-lp-automator/contracts/v1_1/IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorV1_1.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0\n\npragma solidity 0.8.19;\n\n/* solhint-disable contract-name-camelcase */\n\nimport {ISwapRouter} from \"@uniswap/v3-periphery/contracts/interfaces/ISwapRouter.sol\";\nimport {ChainlinkQuoter} from \"./../ChainlinkQuoter.sol\";\nimport {IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorState} from \"../interfaces/IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorState.sol\";\n\n/**\n * @title IOrangeDopexV2LPAutomatorV1\n * @dev Interface for the Orange Dopex V2 LP Automator contract.\n * @author Orange Finance\n */\ninterface IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorV1_1 is IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorState {\n    /**\n     * @dev Struct representing locked Dopex shares.\n     * @param tokenId The ID of the token.\n     * @param shares The number of shares locked.\n     */\n    struct LockedDopexShares {\n        uint256 tokenId;\n        uint256 shares;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Struct representing parameters for rebalancing swaps.\n     * @param assetsShortage The shortage of assets.\n     * @param counterAssetsShortage The shortage of counter assets.\n     * @param maxCounterAssetsUseForSwap The maximum amount of counter assets to use for swapping.\n     * @param maxAssetsUseForSwap The maximum amount of assets to use for swapping.\n     */\n    struct RebalanceSwapParams {\n        uint256 assetsShortage;\n        uint256 counterAssetsShortage;\n        uint256 maxCounterAssetsUseForSwap;\n        uint256 maxAssetsUseForSwap;\n    }\n\n    event Deposit(address indexed sender, uint256 assets, uint256 sharesMinted);\n    event Redeem(address indexed sender, uint256 shares, uint256 assetsWithdrawn);\n    event Rebalance(address indexed sender, RebalanceTickInfo[] ticksMint, RebalanceTickInfo[] ticksBurn);\n\n    event SetOwner(address user, bool approved);\n    event SetStrategist(address user, bool approved);\n    event DepositCapSet(uint256 depositCap);\n    event DepositFeePipsSet(uint24 depositFeePips);\n\n    error AddressZero();\n    error AmountZero();\n    error MaxTicksReached();\n    error InvalidRebalanceParams();\n    error MinAssetsRequired(uint256 minAssets, uint256 actualAssets);\n    error TokenAddressMismatch();\n    error TokenNotPermitted();\n    error DepositTooSmall();\n    error DepositCapExceeded();\n    error SharesTooSmall();\n    error FeePipsTooHigh();\n    error UnsupportedDecimals();\n    error MinDepositAssetsTooSmall();\n    error OnlyOwner();\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the swap router contract.\n     */\n    function router() external view returns (ISwapRouter);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the Chainlink quoter contract.\n     */\n    function quoter() external view returns (ChainlinkQuoter);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the address of the asset USD feed.\n     */\n    function assetUsdFeed() external view returns (address);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the address of the counter asset USD feed.\n     */\n    function counterAssetUsdFeed() external view returns (address);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the minimum deposit of assets.\n     */\n    function minDepositAssets() external view returns (uint256);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the deposit cap.\n     */\n    function depositCap() external view returns (uint256);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Deposits the specified amount of assets into the contract and returns the corresponding number of shares.\n     * @param assets The amount of assets to deposit.\n     * @return shares The number of shares received after the deposit.\n     * @notice This function allows users to deposit assets into the contract.\n     * It performs various checks such as ensuring the amount is not zero, not below the minimum deposit assets, and not exceeding the deposit cap.\n     * If the total supply of shares is zero, a small portion is minted to the zero address, and the remaining shares are assigned to the depositor.\n     * If there is a performance fee, it is deducted from the shares and minted to the performance fee recipient.\n     * Finally, the shares are minted to the depositor's address and the assets are transferred from the depositor to the contract.\n     */\n    function deposit(uint256 assets) external returns (uint256 shares);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Redeems a specified number of shares and returns the redeemed assets along with the locked Dopex shares.\n     * @param shares The number of shares to redeem.\n     * @param minAssets The minimum required assets to be redeemed.\n     * @return assets The redeemed assets.\n     * @return lockedDopexShares An array of locked Dopex shares.\n     */\n    function redeem(\n        uint256 shares,\n        uint256 minAssets\n    ) external returns (uint256 assets, LockedDopexShares[] memory lockedDopexShares);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Rebalance the liquidity positions in the OrangeDopexV2LPAutomatorV1 contract.\n     * Only the address with the STRATEGIST_ROLE can call this function.\n     *\n     * @param ticksMint An array of RebalanceTickInfo structs representing the ticks to be minted.\n     * @param ticksBurn An array of RebalanceTickInfo structs representing the ticks to be burned.\n     * @param swapParams A RebalanceSwapParams struct representing the swap parameters for rebalancing.\n     */\n    function rebalance(\n        RebalanceTickInfo[] calldata ticksMint,\n        RebalanceTickInfo[] calldata ticksBurn,\n        RebalanceSwapParams calldata swapParams\n    ) external;\n}\n","keccak256":"0x8fac8b035cdcaabbc3e5651a9e249af825b077d950356330548c1897a46f2239","license":"GPL-3.0"},"contracts/dopex-v2-lp-automator/contracts/v1_1/OrangeStrykeLPAutomatorV1_1.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0\n\npragma solidity 0.8.19;\n\n/* solhint-disable contract-name-camelcase, max-states-count */\n\nimport {IUniswapV3Pool} from \"@uniswap/v3-core/contracts/interfaces/IUniswapV3Pool.sol\";\nimport {TickMath} from \"@uniswap/v3-core/contracts/libraries/TickMath.sol\";\nimport {FullMath} from \"@uniswap/v3-core/contracts/libraries/FullMath.sol\";\nimport {ISwapRouter} from \"@uniswap/v3-periphery/contracts/interfaces/ISwapRouter.sol\";\nimport {LiquidityAmounts} from \"@uniswap/v3-periphery/contracts/libraries/LiquidityAmounts.sol\";\n\nimport {IERC20} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol\";\nimport {SafeERC20} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/utils/SafeERC20.sol\";\nimport {EnumerableSet} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/structs/EnumerableSet.sol\";\nimport {SafeCast} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/math/SafeCast.sol\";\n\nimport {UUPSUpgradeable} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/proxy/utils/UUPSUpgradeable.sol\";\n\nimport {IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2} from \"../vendor/dopexV2/IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2.sol\";\nimport {IDopexV2PositionManager} from \"../vendor/dopexV2/IDopexV2PositionManager.sol\";\n\nimport {ChainlinkQuoter} from \"../ChainlinkQuoter.sol\";\nimport {UniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityLibV2} from \"../lib/UniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityLibV2.sol\";\nimport {OrangeERC20Upgradeable} from \"../OrangeERC20Upgradeable.sol\";\nimport {IERC20Decimals} from \"../interfaces/IERC20Extended.sol\";\nimport {IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorV1_1} from \"./IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorV1_1.sol\";\nimport {IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorState} from \"../interfaces/IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorState.sol\";\n\ninterface IMulticallProvider {\n    function multicall(bytes[] calldata data) external returns (bytes[] memory results);\n}\n\n/**\n * @title OrangeStrykeLPAutomatorV1\n * @dev Automate liquidity provision of Stryke CLAMM\n * @author Orange Finance\n */\ncontract OrangeStrykeLPAutomatorV1_1 is IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorV1_1, UUPSUpgradeable, OrangeERC20Upgradeable {\n    using FullMath for uint256;\n    using SafeERC20 for IERC20;\n    using SafeCast for uint256;\n    using EnumerableSet for EnumerableSet.UintSet;\n    using TickMath for int24;\n    using UniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityLibV2 for IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2;\n\n    /*///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\n                                                    Vault params\n    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/\n    uint24 private constant _MAX_TICKS = 150;\n    /// @notice max deposit fee percentage is 1% (hundredth of 1e6)\n    uint24 private constant _MAX_PERF_FEE_PIPS = 10_000;\n\n    IERC20 public asset;\n    IERC20 public counterAsset;\n\n    uint256 public minDepositAssets;\n    uint256 public depositCap;\n\n    /// @notice deposit fee percentage, hundredths of a bip (1 pip = 0.0001%)\n    uint24 public depositFeePips;\n    address public depositFeeRecipient;\n\n    mapping(address => bool) public isOwner;\n    mapping(address => bool) public isStrategist;\n\n    EnumerableSet.UintSet internal _activeTicks;\n\n    uint8 private _decimals;\n\n    /*///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\n                                                    Stryke\n    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/\n    IDopexV2PositionManager public manager;\n    IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2 public handler;\n    address public handlerHook;\n\n    /*///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\n                                                    Chainlink\n    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/\n    ChainlinkQuoter public quoter;\n    address public assetUsdFeed;\n    address public counterAssetUsdFeed;\n\n    /*///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\n                                                    Uniswap\n    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/\n    IUniswapV3Pool public pool;\n    ISwapRouter public router;\n    int24 public poolTickSpacing;\n\n    /*///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\n                                                    Modifiers\n    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/\n\n    modifier onlyOwner() {\n        if (!isOwner[msg.sender]) revert OnlyOwner();\n        _;\n    }\n\n    modifier onlyStrategist() {\n        if (!isStrategist[msg.sender]) revert OnlyOwner();\n        _;\n    }\n\n    /*///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\n                                                    Upgradeable functions\n    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/\n\n    /// @custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow constructor\n    constructor() {\n        _disableInitializers();\n    }\n\n    // solhint-disable-next-line no-empty-blocks\n    function _authorizeUpgrade(address) internal override onlyOwner {}\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Constructor arguments for OrangeDopexV2LPAutomatorV1 contract.\n     * @param name The name of the ERC20 token.\n     * @param symbol The symbol of the ERC20 token.\n     * @param admin The address of the admin role.\n     * @param manager The address of the DopexV2PositionManager contract.\n     * @param handler The address of the UniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandler contract.\n     * @param router The address of the SwapRouter contract.\n     * @param pool The address of the UniswapV3Pool contract.\n     * @param asset The address of the ERC20 token used as the deposit asset in this vault.\n     * @param minDepositAssets The minimum amount of assets that can be deposited.\n     */\n    struct InitArgs {\n        string name;\n        string symbol;\n        address admin;\n        IDopexV2PositionManager manager;\n        IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2 handler;\n        address handlerHook;\n        ISwapRouter router;\n        IUniswapV3Pool pool;\n        IERC20 asset;\n        ChainlinkQuoter quoter;\n        address assetUsdFeed;\n        address counterAssetUsdFeed;\n        uint256 minDepositAssets;\n    }\n\n    function initialize(InitArgs memory args) public initializer {\n        if (args.asset != IERC20(args.pool.token0()) && args.asset != IERC20(args.pool.token1()))\n            revert TokenAddressMismatch();\n        if (args.assetUsdFeed == address(0) || args.counterAssetUsdFeed == address(0)) revert AddressZero();\n\n        __ERC20_init(args.name, args.symbol);\n\n        _decimals = IERC20Decimals(address(args.asset)).decimals();\n\n        quoter = args.quoter;\n        assetUsdFeed = args.assetUsdFeed;\n        counterAssetUsdFeed = args.counterAssetUsdFeed;\n\n        manager = args.manager;\n        handler = args.handler;\n        handlerHook = args.handlerHook;\n        router = args.router;\n        pool = args.pool;\n        asset = args.asset;\n        counterAsset = args.pool.token0() == address(args.asset)\n            ? IERC20(args.pool.token1())\n            : IERC20(args.pool.token0());\n        poolTickSpacing = args.pool.tickSpacing();\n\n        if (_decimals < 3) revert UnsupportedDecimals();\n        if (IERC20Decimals(address(counterAsset)).decimals() < 3) revert UnsupportedDecimals();\n\n        // The minimum deposit must be set to greater than 0.1% of the asset's value, otherwise, the transaction will result in zero shares being allocated.\n        if (args.minDepositAssets <= (10 ** _decimals / 1000)) revert MinDepositAssetsTooSmall();\n        // The minimum deposit should be set to 1e6 (equivalent to 100% in pip units). Failing to do so will result in a zero deposit fee for the recipient.\n        if (args.minDepositAssets < 1e6) revert MinDepositAssetsTooSmall();\n\n        minDepositAssets = args.minDepositAssets;\n\n        args.asset.safeIncreaseAllowance(address(args.manager), type(uint256).max);\n        args.asset.safeIncreaseAllowance(address(args.router), type(uint256).max);\n\n        counterAsset.safeIncreaseAllowance(address(args.manager), type(uint256).max);\n        counterAsset.safeIncreaseAllowance(address(args.router), type(uint256).max);\n\n        isOwner[args.admin] = true;\n    }\n\n    /*///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\n                                                    ADMIN FUNCTIONS\n    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/\n\n    function setOwner(address user, bool approved) external onlyOwner {\n        isOwner[user] = approved;\n    }\n\n    function setStrategist(address user, bool approved) external onlyOwner {\n        isStrategist[user] = approved;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Sets the deposit cap for the automator.\n     * @param _depositCap The new deposit cap value.\n     * Requirements:\n     * - Caller must have the DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE.\n     */\n    function setDepositCap(uint256 _depositCap) external onlyOwner {\n        depositCap = _depositCap;\n\n        emit DepositCapSet(_depositCap);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Sets the deposit fee pips for a recipient.\n     * @param recipient The address of the recipient.\n     * @param pips The new deposit fee pips value.\n     * Requirements:\n     * - Caller must have the DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE.\n     * - Recipient address must not be zero.\n     * - deposit fee pips must not exceed MAX_PERF_FEE_PIPS.\n     */\n    function setDepositFeePips(address recipient, uint24 pips) external onlyOwner {\n        if (recipient == address(0)) revert AddressZero();\n        if (pips > _MAX_PERF_FEE_PIPS) revert FeePipsTooHigh();\n\n        depositFeeRecipient = recipient;\n        depositFeePips = pips;\n\n        emit DepositFeePipsSet(pips);\n    }\n\n    function decimals() public view override returns (uint8) {\n        return _decimals;\n    }\n\n    /*///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\n                                                    VAULT STATE DERIVATION FUNCTIONS\n    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/\n\n    /// @inheritdoc IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorState\n    function totalAssets() public view returns (uint256) {\n        // 1. calculate the total assets in Dopex pools\n        uint256 _length = _activeTicks.length();\n        uint256 _tid;\n        uint128 _liquidity;\n        (int24 _lt, int24 _ut) = (0, 0);\n        (uint256 _sum0, uint256 _sum1) = (0, 0);\n        (uint256 _a0, uint256 _a1) = (0, 0);\n\n        (uint160 _sqrtRatioX96, , , , , , ) = pool.slot0();\n\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < _length; ) {\n            _lt = int24(uint24(_activeTicks.at(i)));\n            _ut = _lt + poolTickSpacing;\n            _tid = handler.tokenId(address(pool), handlerHook, _lt, _ut);\n\n            _liquidity = handler.convertToAssets((handler.balanceOf(address(this), _tid)).toUint128(), _tid);\n\n            (_a0, _a1) = LiquidityAmounts.getAmountsForLiquidity(\n                _sqrtRatioX96,\n                _lt.getSqrtRatioAtTick(),\n                _ut.getSqrtRatioAtTick(),\n                _liquidity\n            );\n\n            _sum0 += _a0;\n            _sum1 += _a1;\n\n            unchecked {\n                i++;\n            }\n        }\n\n        // 2. merge into the total assets in the automator\n        (uint256 _base, uint256 _quote) = (counterAsset.balanceOf(address(this)), asset.balanceOf(address(this)));\n\n        if (address(asset) == pool.token0()) {\n            _base += _sum1;\n            _quote += _sum0;\n        } else {\n            _base += _sum0;\n            _quote += _sum1;\n        }\n\n        return\n            _quote +\n            quoter.getQuote(\n                ChainlinkQuoter.QuoteRequest({\n                    baseToken: address(counterAsset),\n                    quoteToken: address(asset),\n                    baseAmount: _base,\n                    baseUsdFeed: counterAssetUsdFeed,\n                    quoteUsdFeed: assetUsdFeed\n                })\n            );\n    }\n\n    /// @inheritdoc IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorState\n    function convertToShares(uint256 assets) external view returns (uint256) {\n        // NOTE: no need to check total supply as it is checked in deposit function.\n        return assets.mulDiv(totalSupply(), totalAssets());\n    }\n\n    /// @inheritdoc IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorState\n    function convertToAssets(uint256 shares) public view returns (uint256) {\n        uint256 _supply = totalSupply();\n\n        return _supply == 0 ? shares : shares.mulDiv(totalAssets(), _supply);\n    }\n\n    /// @inheritdoc IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorState\n    function getActiveTicks() external view returns (int24[] memory) {\n        uint256[] memory _tempTicks = _activeTicks.values();\n        int24[] memory __activeTicks = new int24[](_tempTicks.length);\n\n        for (uint256 i; i < _tempTicks.length; i++) {\n            __activeTicks[i] = int24(uint24(_tempTicks[i]));\n        }\n\n        return __activeTicks;\n    }\n\n    /*///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\n                                                    USER ACTIONS\n    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/\n\n    /// @inheritdoc IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorV1_1\n    function deposit(uint256 assets) external returns (uint256 shares) {\n        if (assets == 0) revert AmountZero();\n        if (assets < minDepositAssets) revert DepositTooSmall();\n        if (assets + totalAssets() > depositCap) revert DepositCapExceeded();\n\n        uint256 _beforeTotalAssets = totalAssets();\n\n        // NOTE: Call transfer on first to avoid reentrancy of ERC777 assets that have hook before transfer.\n        // This is a common practice, similar to OpenZeppelin's ERC4626.\n        //\n        // Reference: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/a72c9561b9c200bac87f14ffd43a8c719fd6fa5a/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/ERC4626.sol#L244\n\n        asset.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender, address(this), assets);\n\n        if (totalSupply() == 0) {\n            uint256 _dead;\n            // this cannot overflow as we ensure that the decimals is at least 3 in the constructor\n            unchecked {\n                _dead = 10 ** _decimals / 1000;\n            }\n\n            // NOTE: mint small amount of shares to avoid sandwich attack on the first deposit\n            // https://mixbytes.io/blog/overview-of-the-inflation-attack\n            _mint(address(0), _dead);\n\n            unchecked {\n                shares = assets - _dead;\n            }\n        } else {\n            // NOTE: Assets are already transferred before calculation, so we can use the total assets before deposit\n            shares = assets.mulDiv(totalSupply(), _beforeTotalAssets);\n        }\n\n        uint256 _fee = shares.mulDiv(depositFeePips, 1e6);\n        // NOTE: no possibility of minting to the zero address as we can't set zero address with fee pips\n        if (_fee > 0) {\n            _mint(depositFeeRecipient, _fee);\n            shares = shares - _fee;\n        }\n\n        if (shares == 0) revert DepositTooSmall();\n        _mint(msg.sender, shares);\n\n        emit Deposit(msg.sender, assets, shares);\n    }\n\n    /// @dev avoid stack too deep error\n    struct RedeemLoopCache {\n        int24 lowerTick;\n        uint256 tokenId;\n        uint256 shareLocked;\n        uint256 shareRedeemable;\n        uint256 lockedShareIndex;\n    }\n\n    /// @inheritdoc IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorV1_1\n    function redeem(\n        uint256 shares,\n        uint256 minAssets\n    ) external returns (uint256 assets, LockedDopexShares[] memory lockedDopexShares) {\n        if (shares == 0) revert AmountZero();\n        if (convertToAssets(shares) == 0) revert SharesTooSmall();\n\n        uint256 _tsBeforeBurn = totalSupply();\n\n        // To avoid any reentrancy, we burn the shares first\n        _burn(msg.sender, shares);\n\n        uint256 _preBase = counterAsset.balanceOf(address(this));\n        uint256 _preQuote = asset.balanceOf(address(this));\n\n        RedeemLoopCache memory c;\n        uint256 _length = _activeTicks.length();\n\n        LockedDopexShares[] memory _tempShares = new LockedDopexShares[](_length);\n\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < _length; ) {\n            c.lowerTick = int24(uint24(_activeTicks.at(i)));\n\n            c.tokenId = handler.tokenId(address(pool), handlerHook, c.lowerTick, c.lowerTick + poolTickSpacing);\n\n            (, uint128 _redeemableLiquidity, uint128 _lockedLiquidity, , ) = handler.positionDetail(\n                address(this),\n                c.tokenId\n            );\n\n            // total supply before burn is used to calculate the precise share\n            c.shareRedeemable = uint256(handler.convertToShares(_redeemableLiquidity, c.tokenId)).mulDiv(\n                shares,\n                _tsBeforeBurn\n            );\n            c.shareLocked = uint256(handler.convertToShares(_lockedLiquidity, c.tokenId)).mulDiv(shares, _tsBeforeBurn);\n\n            // locked share is transferred to the user\n            if (c.shareLocked > 0) {\n                unchecked {\n                    _tempShares[c.lockedShareIndex++] = LockedDopexShares({tokenId: c.tokenId, shares: c.shareLocked});\n                }\n\n                handler.transfer(msg.sender, c.tokenId, c.shareLocked);\n            }\n\n            // redeemable share is burned\n            if (c.shareRedeemable > 0)\n                if (handler.paused()) {\n                    handler.transfer(msg.sender, c.tokenId, c.shareRedeemable);\n                } else {\n                    _burnPosition(c.lowerTick, c.lowerTick + poolTickSpacing, c.shareRedeemable.toUint128());\n                }\n\n            unchecked {\n                i++;\n            }\n        }\n\n        // copy to exact size array\n        lockedDopexShares = new LockedDopexShares[](c.lockedShareIndex);\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < c.lockedShareIndex; ) {\n            lockedDopexShares[i] = _tempShares[i];\n\n            unchecked {\n                i++;\n            }\n        }\n\n        /**\n         * 1. shares.mulDiv(_preBase, _totalSupply()) means the portion of idle base asset\n         * 2. counterAsset.balanceOf(address(this)) - _preBase means the base asset from redeemed positions\n         */\n        uint256 _payBase = shares.mulDiv(_preBase, _tsBeforeBurn) + counterAsset.balanceOf(address(this)) - _preBase;\n\n        if (_payBase > 0) _swapToRedeemAssets(_payBase);\n\n        // solhint-disable-next-line reentrancy\n        assets = shares.mulDiv(_preQuote, _tsBeforeBurn) + asset.balanceOf(address(this)) - _preQuote;\n\n        if (assets < minAssets) revert MinAssetsRequired(minAssets, assets);\n\n        asset.safeTransfer(msg.sender, assets);\n\n        emit Redeem(msg.sender, shares, assets);\n    }\n\n    function _burnPosition(int24 lowerTick, int24 upperTick, uint128 shares) internal {\n        manager.burnPosition(\n            handler,\n            abi.encode(\n                IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2.BurnPositionParams({\n                    pool: address(pool),\n                    hook: handlerHook,\n                    tickLower: lowerTick,\n                    tickUpper: upperTick,\n                    shares: shares\n                })\n            )\n        );\n    }\n\n    function _swapToRedeemAssets(uint256 counterAssetsIn) internal {\n        router.exactInputSingle(\n            ISwapRouter.ExactInputSingleParams({\n                tokenIn: address(counterAsset),\n                tokenOut: address(asset),\n                fee: pool.fee(),\n                recipient: address(this),\n                deadline: block.timestamp,\n                amountIn: counterAssetsIn,\n                amountOutMinimum: 0,\n                sqrtPriceLimitX96: 0\n            })\n        );\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @dev withdraw pooled assets from the automator. This is used when the automator is rewarded by protocols with another token to prevent lock up.\n     * @param token The address of the ERC20 token to withdraw.\n     */\n    function withdraw(IERC20 token) external onlyOwner {\n        if (token == asset) revert TokenNotPermitted();\n        if (token == counterAsset) revert TokenNotPermitted();\n        token.safeTransfer(msg.sender, token.balanceOf(address(this)));\n    }\n\n    /*///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////\n                                                    STRATEGIST ACTIONS\n    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/\n\n    /// @inheritdoc IOrangeStrykeLPAutomatorV1_1\n    function rebalance(\n        RebalanceTickInfo[] calldata ticksMint,\n        RebalanceTickInfo[] calldata ticksBurn,\n        RebalanceSwapParams calldata swapParams\n    ) external onlyStrategist {\n        if (ticksMint.length + _activeTicks.length() > _MAX_TICKS) revert MaxTicksReached();\n\n        bytes[] memory _burnCalldataBatch = _createBurnCalldataBatch(ticksBurn);\n        // NOTE: burn should be called before mint to receive the assets from the burned position\n        if (_burnCalldataBatch.length > 0) IMulticallProvider(address(manager)).multicall(_burnCalldataBatch);\n\n        // NOTE: after receiving the assets from the burned position, swap should be called to get the assets for mint\n        // ! this should be called before mint. otherwise current tick might be changed and mint will fail\n        _swapBeforeRebalanceMint(swapParams);\n\n        bytes[] memory _mintCalldataBatch = _createMintCalldataBatch(ticksMint);\n\n        if (_mintCalldataBatch.length > 0) IMulticallProvider(address(manager)).multicall(_mintCalldataBatch);\n\n        emit Rebalance(msg.sender, ticksMint, ticksBurn);\n    }\n\n    function _swapBeforeRebalanceMint(RebalanceSwapParams calldata swapParams) internal {\n        if (swapParams.assetsShortage > 0) {\n            router.exactOutputSingle(\n                ISwapRouter.ExactOutputSingleParams({\n                    tokenIn: address(counterAsset),\n                    tokenOut: address(asset),\n                    fee: pool.fee(),\n                    recipient: address(this),\n                    deadline: block.timestamp,\n                    amountOut: swapParams.assetsShortage,\n                    amountInMaximum: swapParams.maxCounterAssetsUseForSwap,\n                    sqrtPriceLimitX96: 0\n                })\n            );\n        }\n\n        if (swapParams.counterAssetsShortage > 0) {\n            router.exactOutputSingle(\n                ISwapRouter.ExactOutputSingleParams({\n                    tokenIn: address(asset),\n                    tokenOut: address(counterAsset),\n                    fee: pool.fee(),\n                    recipient: address(this),\n                    deadline: block.timestamp,\n                    amountOut: swapParams.counterAssetsShortage,\n                    amountInMaximum: swapParams.maxAssetsUseForSwap,\n                    sqrtPriceLimitX96: 0\n                })\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    function _createMintCalldataBatch(\n        RebalanceTickInfo[] calldata ticksMint\n    ) internal returns (bytes[] memory mintCalldataBatch) {\n        (uint256 _actualMintLen, uint256 ignoreIndex) = _getSafeMintParams(ticksMint);\n        mintCalldataBatch = new bytes[](_actualMintLen);\n\n        int24 _lt;\n        int24 _ut;\n        uint256 _tid;\n        uint256 j;\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < ticksMint.length; ) {\n            if (i == ignoreIndex) {\n                unchecked {\n                    i++;\n                }\n                continue;\n            }\n\n            _lt = ticksMint[i].tick;\n            _ut = _lt + poolTickSpacing;\n\n            mintCalldataBatch[j] = _createMintCalldata(_lt, _ut, ticksMint[i].liquidity);\n\n            // If the position is not active, push it to the active ticks\n            _tid = handler.tokenId(address(pool), handlerHook, _lt, _ut);\n            if (handler.balanceOf(address(this), _tid) == 0) _activeTicks.add(uint256(uint24(_lt)));\n\n            unchecked {\n                i++;\n                j++;\n            }\n        }\n    }\n\n    // NOTE: skip current tick as it is not allowed to mint on Dopex\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the length of the ticksMint array after skipping the current tick if it is included.\n     *      Also returns the index of the current tick in the ticksMint array if it is included.\n     *      We need to avoid revert when mint Dopex position in the current tick.\n     *      This should be done on automator because current tick got on caller (this must be off-chain) is different from the current tick got on automator.\n     * @param ticksMint An array of RebalanceTickInfo structs representing the ticks to mint.\n     */\n    function _getSafeMintParams(\n        RebalanceTickInfo[] calldata ticksMint\n    ) internal view returns (uint256 mintLength, uint256 ignoreIndex) {\n        uint256 _providedLength = ticksMint.length;\n        mintLength = _providedLength;\n\n        (, int24 _ct, , , , , ) = pool.slot0();\n        int24 _spacing = poolTickSpacing;\n\n        // current lower tick is calculated by rounding down the current tick to the nearest tick spacing\n        // if current tick is negative and not divisible by tick spacing, we need to subtract one tick spacing to get the correct lower tick\n        int24 _currentLt = _ct < 0 && _ct % _spacing != 0\n            ? (_ct / _spacing - 1) * _spacing\n            : (_ct / _spacing) * _spacing;\n\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < _providedLength; ) {\n            if (ticksMint[i].tick == _currentLt) {\n                unchecked {\n                    mintLength--;\n                    ignoreIndex = i;\n                    break;\n                }\n            }\n            unchecked {\n                i++;\n            }\n        }\n\n        if (mintLength == _providedLength) ignoreIndex = type(uint256).max;\n    }\n\n    function _createBurnCalldataBatch(\n        RebalanceTickInfo[] calldata ticksBurn\n    ) internal returns (bytes[] memory burnCalldataBatch) {\n        int24 _lt;\n        int24 _ut;\n        uint256 _tid;\n        uint256 _shares;\n        uint256 _burnLength = ticksBurn.length;\n        burnCalldataBatch = new bytes[](_burnLength);\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < _burnLength; ) {\n            _lt = ticksBurn[i].tick;\n            _ut = _lt + poolTickSpacing;\n\n            _tid = _tid = handler.tokenId(address(pool), handlerHook, _lt, _ut);\n            _shares = handler.convertToShares(ticksBurn[i].liquidity, _tid);\n            burnCalldataBatch[i] = _createBurnCalldata(_lt, _ut, _shares.toUint128());\n\n            // if all shares will be burned, pop the active tick\n            if (handler.balanceOf(address(this), _tid) - _shares == 0) _activeTicks.remove(uint256(uint24(_lt)));\n\n            unchecked {\n                i++;\n            }\n        }\n    }\n\n    function _createMintCalldata(int24 lt, int24 ut, uint128 liq) internal view returns (bytes memory) {\n        return\n            abi.encodeWithSelector(\n                IDopexV2PositionManager.mintPosition.selector,\n                handler,\n                abi.encode(\n                    IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2.MintPositionParams({\n                        pool: address(pool),\n                        hook: handlerHook,\n                        tickLower: lt,\n                        tickUpper: ut,\n                        liquidity: liq\n                    })\n                )\n            );\n    }\n\n    function _createBurnCalldata(int24 lt, int24 ut, uint128 shares) internal view returns (bytes memory) {\n        return\n            abi.encodeWithSelector(\n                IDopexV2PositionManager.burnPosition.selector,\n                handler,\n                abi.encode(\n                    IUniswapV3SingleTickLiquidityHandlerV2.BurnPositionParams({\n                        pool: address(pool),\n                        hook: handlerHook,\n                        tickLower: lt,\n                        tickUpper: ut,\n                        shares: shares\n                    })\n                )\n            );\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0xd4332e2eaae2b8b01d6eb72513afefc48e5781afd9ecb3a3c5e60a97de9026bd","license":"GPL-3.0"},"contracts/dopex-v2-lp-automator/contracts/vendor/dopexV2/IDopexV2PositionManager.sol":{"content":"// devdoc.author: Orange Finance
devdoc.details: Automate liquidity provision of Stryke CLAMM

AdminChanged(address,address).details: Emitted when the admin account has changed.

Approval(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when the allowance of a `spender` for an `owner` is set by a call to {approve}. `value` is the new allowance.

BeaconUpgraded(address).details: Emitted when the beacon is changed.

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `value` tokens are moved from one account (`from`) to another (`to`). Note that `value` may be zero.

Upgraded(address).details: Emitted when the implementation is upgraded.

approve(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-approve}. NOTE: If `amount` is the maximum `uint256`, the allowance is not updated on `transferFrom`. This is semantically equivalent to an infinite approval. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

convertToAssets(uint256).details: Converts the given amount of shares to assets based on the total supply and total assets.

params.shares: The amount of shares to convert to assets.

convertToShares(uint256).details: Converts the given amount of assets to shares based on the total supply and total assets.

params.assets: The amount of assets to convert to shares.

decimals().details: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5.05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`). Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei. This is the default value returned by this function, unless it's overridden. NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically decreases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address. - `spender` must have allowance for the caller of at least `subtractedValue`.

deposit(uint256).details: Deposits the specified amount of assets into the contract and returns the corresponding number of shares.

params.assets: The amount of assets to deposit.

returns.shares: The number of shares received after the deposit.

getActiveTicks().details: Retrieves the active ticks as an array of int24 values.

returns._0: An array of int24 values representing the active ticks.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically increases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

rebalance((int24,uint128)[],(int24,uint1.details: Rebalance the liquidity positions in the OrangeDopexV2LPAutomatorV1 contract. Only the address with the STRATEGIST_ROLE can call this function.

params.swapParams: A RebalanceSwapParams struct representing the swap parameters for rebalancing.
params.ticksBurn: An array of RebalanceTickInfo structs representing the ticks to be burned.
params.ticksMint: An array of RebalanceTickInfo structs representing the ticks to be minted.

redeem(uint256,uint256).details: Redeems a specified number of shares and returns the redeemed assets along with the locked Dopex shares.

params.minAssets: The minimum required assets to be redeemed.
params.shares: The number of shares to redeem.

returns.lockedDopexShares: An array of locked Dopex shares.

setDepositCap(uint256).details: Sets the deposit cap for the automator.

params._depositCap: The new deposit cap value. Requirements: - Caller must have the DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE.

setDepositFeePips(address,uint24).details: Sets the deposit fee pips for a recipient.

params.pips: The new deposit fee pips value. Requirements: - Caller must have the DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE. - Recipient address must not be zero. - deposit fee pips must not exceed MAX_PERF_FEE_PIPS.

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

totalAssets().details: Calculates the total assets in the automator contract. It includes the assets in the Dopex pools and the automator contract itself.

returns._0: The total assets in the automator contract.

transfer(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transfer}. Requirements: - `to` cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least `amount`.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transferFrom}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. This is not required by the EIP. See the note at the beginning of {ERC20}. NOTE: Does not update the allowance if the current allowance is the maximum `uint256`. Requirements: - `from` and `to` cannot be the zero address. - `from` must have a balance of at least `amount`. - the caller must have allowance for ``from``'s tokens of at least `amount`.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

withdraw(address).details: withdraw pooled assets from the automator. This is used when the automator is rewarded by protocols with another token to prevent lock up.

params.token: The address of the ERC20 token to withdraw.

asset.details: Returns the deposit asset token contract.

assetUsdFeed.details: Returns the address of the asset USD feed.

counterAsset.details: Returns the counter asset token contract.

counterAssetUsdFeed.details: Returns the address of the counter asset USD feed.

minDepositAssets.details: Returns the minimum deposit of assets.

pool.details: Returns the Uniswap V3 pool contract.

poolTickSpacing.details: Returns the tick spacing of the pool.

devdoc.title: OrangeStrykeLPAutomatorV1

deposit(uint256).notice: This function allows users to deposit assets into the contract. It performs various checks such as ensuring the amount is not zero, not below the minimum deposit assets, and not exceeding the deposit cap. If the total supply of shares is zero, a small portion is minted to the zero address, and the remaining shares are assigned to the depositor. If there is a performance fee, it is deducted from the shares and minted to the performance fee recipient. Finally, the shares are minted to the depositor's address and the assets are transferred from the depositor to the contract.

depositFeePips().notice: deposit fee percentage, hundredths of a bip (1 pip = 0.0001%)
